input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
WeatherTech Custom Fit Cargo Liners for Lexus RX, Tan

Item specifications:
Provides complete trunk/cargo area protection
Computer designed to fit your vehicle
Raised lip to keep spills/dirt/grease off interior
Made from proprietary custom blended tpo
Textured finish which helps to keep cargo stable
Flexible under extreme temperatures

Product description:
input_text.Response A: WeatherTech Cargo Liners provide complete trunk-cargo area protection. The cargo liners are computer designed to fit your vehicle and have a raised lip to keep spills, dirt and grease off the interior of your vehicle. Made from proprietary custom blended TPO (thermopolyolefin) that is not only wear-resistant but also remains flexible under extreme temperatures. The WeatherTech Cargo Liner features a textured finish that helps to keep cargo from shifting and is perfect for all families on the go.
input_text.Response B: The WeatherTech Cargo Liners provide complete trunk/cargo area protection. The Cargo Liners are computer designed to fit your vehicle and have a raised lip to keep spills, dirt and grease off your vehicle's interior, and they are flexible under extreme temperatures. The Cargo Liner features a textured finish that helps to keep cargo from shifting. The WeatherTech Cargo Liners are custom tailored to fit your vehicle and are designed to provide complete trunk/ cargo area protection.
